hero.subheadline: We don't build pretty sites. We build revenue engines. In 2-3 weeks.

problem.title: Sound familiar?
points: Your website looks like it's from 2015
The ad agency blames the website. The web agency blames the ads.
You pay for "marketing" but don't know what exactly
You want to change something on the site and wait 2 weeks
problem.solution_text: One company. Website, SEO and ads. If something doesn't work — it's our problem, not yours.

services.title: How we can help
services.subtitle: Choose the path that fits your needs

build.title: Build a website
build.description: Modern, conversion-optimized website that works as your best salesperson 24/7.

grow.title: Grow your business
grow.description: Website + ongoing care, SEO, and optionally ads. All under one roof.

app.title: Build an app
app.description: MVP or full web/mobile app. From idea to working product.

process.title: See before you pay
process.subtitle: Our process starts by showing you possibilities, not meetings and questionnaires.

step1.title: Share your website
step1.description: Send us your current site link. We analyze what works and what can improve.

step2.title: Get a preview
step2.description: In days you receive a clickable preview of your new site. No commitment, no payment.

step3.title: Decide with knowledge
step3.description: You see the result before investing. Only then do we discuss details and pricing.

about.title: About us
about.story_headline: We Built SwiftBuild Because We Were Frustrated
about.story_intro: We both had the same realization: Most businesses are being held back by their own digital presence.
about.story_frustration_title: It's 2026. Yet we still visit websites that:
story_frustrations: Hide the contact button behind three menus
Look like every other WordPress or WooCommerce template
Work terribly on mobile (where 70% of traffic comes from)
about.story_feeling: We get genuinely frustrated when this happens. Not just as developers—as customers. When a website makes it hard to buy, we don't buy. We leave. And so do your customers.
about.story_premise: So we started SwiftBuild with a simple premise:
about.story_mission: Your website should be your best salesperson.
about.story_mission_detail: It should work 24/7, never get tired, never forget the pitch, and never make customers feel stupid for trying to give you money.
about.story_conclusion: We're not here to build you a "nice website." We're here to build something that actually grows your business.

wouter.name: Wouter Van Muylem
wouter.bio: Spent years at companies where technology was an afterthought. Legacy systems. Repetitive tasks that should have been automated. Tools that fought against productivity instead of enabling it. Now builds the websites he wished existed.

karol.name: Karol Rejf
karol.bio: Watched businesses struggle with websites that actively worked against them—slow, confusing, impossible to update. Sites that cost thousands but converted nobody. Now ensures every SwiftBuild project delivers real results.

speed.title: Speed
speed.description: 2-3 week turnaround. Not 2-3 months. We move fast because we've done this before and we don't waste time on process theater.

design.title: Design That Wows
design.description: We work hard to create that "wow" feeling. No templates. No generic layouts. Your site should make competitors jealous.

understanding.title: Deep Understanding
understanding.description: We do deep dives into your industry. We don't just execute—we become part of your company and think about the value we can create.

conversion.title: Conversion Focus
conversion.description: A beautiful website that doesn't convert is worthless. We build revenue engines, not digital brochures.

point1.title: Everything in one place
point1.description: Website, SEO, ads. No unnecessary middlemen.

point3.title: Talk to people, not a company
point3.description: You know us by name, we know your business.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: The people behind your projects
team.intro: A small but tight-knit team with experience building websites for Polish businesses.

karol.name: Karol Rejf
karol.bio: Your main contact. Former Business Analyst at Colliers. Takes care of every project detail and keeps things on schedule.

tomasz.name: Tomek Górski
tomasz.bio: 10+ years of web development experience. Solution architect and team mentor. Specialist in performance and technical SEO.

anna.name: Ania Bernat
anna.bio: React and Next.js expert. Creates responsive interfaces that look great on every device.

mateusz.name: Maciek Stec
mateusz.bio: Animation and micro-interaction specialist. Turns design mockups into living, interactive websites.

piotr.name: Bartek Lis
piotr.bio: Builds solid backends and integrations. Expert in databases, APIs, and automation.

process.title: See Your New Website Before You Pay a Zloty
process.subtitle: Most web agencies start with endless meetings and questionnaires. We start differently. We show you what's possible first.

steps.title: We Analyze Your Current Site
steps.subtitle: Before we even talk
steps.description: We dive deep into your existing website—what's working, what's not, and what opportunities you're missing.
steps.result: A clear picture of your starting point and potential.

steps.title: We Build You a Preview
steps.subtitle: This is where we're different
steps.description: Before any discovery calls or detailed discussions, we create a working preview of your new website. Not a flat design mockup—an actual clickable prototype you can explore on your phone or computer.
steps.result: A real preview you can share with your team, click through, and imagine as your new site.

steps.title: Discovery Call
steps.subtitle: Now we dive deeper
steps.description: With the preview in hand, we have a focused conversation about your business, goals, and vision. You'll tell us what you love, what you'd change, and share examples of sites that inspire you.
steps.result: The confidence that we truly understand your needs.

steps.title: Design & Proposal
steps.subtitle: Everything documented
steps.description: We create a unified design direction based on your feedback and references, then deliver a clear proposal with scope, timeline, and pricing. No surprises, no hidden costs.
steps.result: A detailed roadmap and transparent pricing.

steps.title: We Build It
steps.subtitle: Professional execution
steps.description: Our team builds your website with modern technology, optimized for speed, mobile devices, and search engines. You'll review progress and provide feedback throughout.
steps.result: A website that performs as good as it looks.

steps.title: Launch & Support
steps.subtitle: Go live with confidence
steps.description: We handle the technical launch, set up analytics, and train you on managing your new site. Plus ongoing support to ensure everything runs smoothly.
steps.result: A live website and the knowledge to maintain it.

rows.traditional: Weeks of meetings before seeing anything

cta.title: Ready to See What's Possible?
cta.description: Share your website URL with us. Within days, you'll have a professional analysis and a clickable preview of your new site—before any commitment.

questions.q: How long does the whole process take?
questions.a: Most projects launch within 3-4 weeks from signed proposal. The initial preview? You'll see that within days of first contact.

questions.q: What if I don't like the preview?
questions.a: The preview is meant to start a conversation, not end one. Your feedback shapes the final design. Most clients love seeing possibilities they hadn't imagined.

questions.q: How much does a website cost?
questions.a: Websites start from 8,000 PLN. Exact pricing depends on project scope—number of pages, features and integrations. You'll know the exact price before committing.
We build with modern frameworks (Next.js) that deliver fast, secure, and SEO-friendly websites. But you don't need to worry about the tech—we handle all of that.

questions.q: Do you work with businesses outside Poland?
questions.a: Yes! While we specialize in Polish SMBs, we work with businesses across Europe. All communication can be in English or Polish.
Everything: design, development, mobile optimization, basic SEO setup, analytics integration, launch support, and training. No hidden fees.
For monthly services (SEO, ads), we recommend a minimum 6-month commitment to see real results. But we don't lock you in—you can leave with one month notice if you're not satisfied.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This privacy policy describes how SwiftBuild collects, uses and protects personal data of our website users.

data_controller.title: Data Controller
data_controller.content: The controller of your personal data is SwiftBuild. For matters related to data protection, you can contact us at: kontakt@swiftbuild.services

data_collection.title: What data we collect
data_collection.content: We collect data you provide directly through the contact form: name, surname, email address, phone number and message content. Additionally, we automatically collect technical data: IP address, browser type, visit time.

data_purpose.title: How we use your data
data_purpose.content: We use data to: respond to your inquiries, prepare cooperation offers, deliver services, and for analytical purposes (improving website performance).

data_sharing.title: Who we share data with
data_sharing.content: We don't sell or rent your data. We may share data with trusted technology partners (hosting, email) only to the extent necessary to provide services.

data_retention.title: How long we keep data
data_retention.content: We store data for the period necessary to achieve the purposes for which it was collected, or until consent is withdrawn, and then for the period required by law.

your_rights.title: Your rights
your_rights.content: You have the right to: access your data, rectification, erasure, restriction of processing, data portability and to object. To exercise these rights, contact us by email.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: Our website uses cookies for analytical and functional purposes. You can manage cookies in your browser settings.

changes.title: Policy changes
changes.content: We reserve the right to update this policy. We will inform you of significant changes by updating the last modified date at the top of the page.
